attributes.action: force companies to scrap the use of premium phone lines
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ever had to phone a company to report a fault on their service e.g. T.V., telephone, broadband or insurance (but to name just a few)? You are already paying for the service they provide, yet they take even more money off you when you need to report a fault in their service! They constantly use 0800 numbers to net their catch and then force you to pay premium rate 0870 and 0845 numbers thereafter! This amounts to robbery! We need to stand united and force these companies to climb down. This practice is nothing more than corporate greed.They have got away with this practice for far too long.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
